attributes.action: Increased policing of illegal fog lights and non-standard lights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am fed up of being dazzled by other drivers using front fog lights in perfect driving conditions.
The use of these lights is unnecessary, inconsiderate and illegal.
I would urge the Government to consider on-the-spot fines and to force vehicle manufacturers to fit switches which reset to off after the ignition is switched off for those forgetful motorists who think they look cool.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
